svg.style: background: transparent; background-color: transparent; color-scheme: light dark;

<mxCell id="0" /> <mxCell id="1" parent="0" /> <mxCell id="5whSfNi4NbQ9N5AU5-yK-1" value="Tennis" style="swimlane;fontStyle=1;align=center;verticalAlign=top;childLayout=stackLayout;horizontal=1;startSize=26;horizontalStack=0;resizeParent=1;resizeParentMax=0;resizeLast=0;collapsible=1;marginBottom=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" id="5whSfNi4NbQ9N5AU5-yK-2" value="<div>+ name1: str</div><div>+ name2: str</div><div>+ score1: int</div><div>+ score2: int</div><div>+ games_won1 = 0</div><div>+ games_won2 = 0</div><div>+ game_over: bpol = False</div><div>+ vocabulary: dict = {...}</div><div>+ winner: str = None</div><div>+ language: str = "EN"&nbsp;</div>"
